basicInfo.name: Silvesta
basicInfo.flavor: After Silvesta collected the shards to form the Stone of Destruction, he tried to purify the evil that the power holds, but failed. The Power of Destruction was released, the world turned to chaos, and war broke out. Silvesta lived in isolation for a long time due to guilt.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Condemnation
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Life Drain. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 72% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Life Drain to 24%.
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Skill 2.name: Purifying Strike
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Passive.name: Knight's Will
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Blessing cap becomes 25% of Max HP.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Grants All Debuff Removal upon triggering Guts.
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 100% of Max HP upon triggering Guts.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Evan, his wife, Teo, meat, justice, peace, adventure
profile.dislikes: Dellons, Pascal, the Power of Destruction, chaos, disorder, failure, seafood
profile.story: After Silvesta collected the shards to form the Stone of Destruction, he tried to purify the evil that the power holds, but failed. The Power of Destruction was released, the world turned to chaos, and war broke out. Silvesta lived in isolation for a long time due to guilt.

basicInfo.name: Silvesta
basicInfo.flavor: While in the palace library, Silvesta discovered a mysterious power described in a book that closely resembled his own. Intrigued, he resigned from his duties as a knight and embarked on an adventure to uncover the secrets of the Power of Destruction.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Condemnation
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Life Drain. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.

Skill 2.name: Purifying Strike
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 55% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 55% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Knight's Will
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Silvesta
basicInfo.flavor: A long time ago, Silvesta was the most famous Knight of Light in Terra Kingdom. His combat prowess and fierce sense of justice earned him the trust of his people.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Self
 - Grants Life Drain. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 57% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.

Skill 2.name: Purifying Strike
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Blessing. [Always Active]
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
